entry.title: Portlets with Wicket 1.5.x in Liferay portal
entry.content:
After Wicket dropped support for portlets and moving it to wicketstuff the settings in XMLs are changed:

portlet.xml should look like


    wickettest4
    wickettest4
    wickettest4
    org.apache.wicket.portlet.WicketPortlet
    
        wicketFilterPath
        /bla
    
    
        text/html
        VIEW
    
    
        wickettest4
        wickettest4

Note new portlet-class. Also, mime-type have to be text/html.

web.xml also changed, notice filter class:


    wicket.wicket
    org.apache.wicket.portlet.PortletFilter
    
        applicationClassName
        org.wicket.WicketApplication
    


    wicket.wicket
    /bla/*
    REQUEST
    INCLUDE
    FORWARD

And of course Maven dependencies also changed:


    org.apache.wicket
    wicket-core
    ${wicket.version}


    org.apache.portals.bridges
    portals-bridges-common
    2.0


    org.wicketstuff
    wicketstuff-portlet
    ${wicket.version}
